abstract: It’s all about semantics. One a conference call Tuesday, BP said it was planning to “high-grade” its assets — newspeak for selling off whatever it must to keep its balance sheet in balance.
snippet: It’s all about semantics. One a conference call Tuesday, BP said it was planning to “high-grade” its assets — newspeak for selling off whatever it must to keep its balance sheet in balance.
lead_paragraph: It’s all about semantics. On a conference call Tuesday, BP said it was planning to “high-grade” its assets — newspeak for selling off whatever it must to keep its balance sheet in balance. That’s just one of the steps the oil giant will take as it embarks on what one hopes will be a safer chapter in its history. The full blueprint is here.
